spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.target: up to five creatures, no two of which can be more than 15 ft. apart
spells.description: A missile of magical energy darts forth from your fingertip and strikes its target, dealing 1d4+1 points of force damage. For every two caster levels beyond 1st, you gain an additional missileâ€”two at 3rd level, three at 5th, four at 7th, and the maximum of five missiles at 9th level.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: A fireball spell generates a searing explosion of flame that detonates with a low roar and deals 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 10d6) to every creature within the area.

spells.name: Cure Light Wounds
spells.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +5). Since undead are powered by negative energy, this spell deals damage to them instead of curing them.

spells.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
spells.description: This spell functions like cure light wounds, except that it cures 2d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +10).

spells.name: Shield
spells.description: Shield creates an invisible shield of force that hovers in front of you. It negates magic missile attacks directed at you. The disk also provides a +4 shield bonus to AC. This bonus applies against incorporeal touch attacks.

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.description: An invisible but tangible field of force surrounds the subject of a mage armor spell, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC. Unlike mundane armor, mage armor entails no armor check penalty, arcane spell failure chance, or speed reduction.

spells.name: Bless
spells.area: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
spells.description: Bless fills your allies with courage. Each ally gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and on saving throws against fear effects.

spells.name: Sleep
components: M (fine sand, rose petals, or a live cricket)
spells.area: one or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burst
spells.description: A sleep spell causes a magical slumber to come upon 4 HD of creatures. Creatures with the fewest HD are affected first. Sleeping creatures are helpless. Slapping or wounding awakens an affected creature.

spells.name: Haste
spells.target: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
spells.description: The transmuted creatures move and act more quickly than normal. Each affected creature gains a +1 bonus on attack rolls and a +1 dodge bonus to AC and Reflex saves. All of the hasted creature's modes of movement increase by 30 feet. Each hasted creature gains an extra attack per round.

spells.name: Slow
spells.target: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
spells.description: An affected creature moves and attacks at a drastically slowed rate. A slowed creature can take only a single move action or standard action each turn, but not both. It takes a -1 penalty on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves. A slowed creature moves at half its normal speed.

spells.name: Invisibility
components: M/DF (an eyelash encased in gum arabic)
spells.target: you or a creature or object weighing no more than 100 lb./level
spells.saving_throw: Will negates (harmless) or Will negates (harmless, object)
spells.description: The creature or object touched becomes invisible. If the recipient is a creature, all items it carries are invisible. Items dropped or put down become visible; items picked up disappear. The spell ends if the subject attacks any creature.

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.description: You detect magical auras. The amount of information revealed depends on how long you study a particular area or subject.

spells.name: Light
spells.description: This spell causes a touched object to glow like a torch, shedding normal light in a 20-foot radius.

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.description: Prestidigitations are minor tricks that novice spellcasters use for practice. Once cast, a prestidigitation spell enables you to perform simple magical effects for 1 hour.

spells.name: Resurrection
spells.description: This spell functions like raise dead, except that you are able to restore life and complete strength to any deceased creature. The creature can have been dead for up to 10 years per caster level.

spells.name: Hold Person
components: F/DF (a small, straight piece of iron)
spells.description: The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place. It is aware and breathes normally but cannot take any actions, even speech. Each round on its turn, the subject may attempt a new saving throw to end the effect.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.description: You release a powerful stroke of electrical energy that deals 1d6 points of electricity damage per caster level (maximum 10d6) to each creature within its area.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing spell that has been cast on a creature or object, to temporarily suppress the magical abilities of a magic item, or to counter another spellcaster's spell.

spells.name: Summon Monster I
components: F/DF (a tiny bag and a small candle)
spells.description: This spell summons an extraplanar creature. It appears where you designate and acts immediately, on your turn. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.

spells.name: Fly
spells.description: The subject can fly at a speed of 60 feet (or 40 feet if it wears medium or heavy armor, or if it carries a medium or heavy load). It can ascend at half speed and descend at double speed, and its maneuverability is good.

cantrips.name: Daze
cantrips.description: Humanoid creature of 4 HD or less loses next action.

cantrips.name: Detect Magic
cantrips.description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

cantrips.name: Detect Poison
cantrips.description: Detects poison in one creature or object.

cantrips.name: Flare
cantrips.description: Dazzles one creature (-1 penalty on attack rolls).

cantrips.name: Mending
cantrips.description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

cantrips.name: Open/Close
cantrips.description: Opens or closes small or light things.
